channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - profile

item.title: Create your own SELinux Gentoo profile
item.description:
Or any other profile for that matter ;-)

A month or so ago we got the question how to enable SELinux on a Gentoo profile that doesn't have a <some profilename>/selinux equivalent. Because we don't create SELinux profiles for all possible profiles out there, having a way to do this â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
